. Since then, a number of amendments have been made therein and it has become necessary and expedient that an up-to-date and authentic version of the Constitution be published by the Assembly. This Eighth Edition, which is intended to provide an updated version of the Constitution, incorporates all amendments made in it till date. TAHIR HUSSAIN Secretary, National Assembly of Pakistan
